lead_paragraph: ROME, Oct. 8 (AP) -- Demonstrations for Premier Mussolini in four northern cities where he gave the people the slogan "Hold Fast!" were cited by the Fascisti tonight as Italy's answer to American suggestions of war-weakened morale.
abstract: Ital press cites Ital pub demonstrations in favor of Mussolini and the war as reply to U S propaganda on Ital morale

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
